channel.title: No-ip help plz
channel.description: my no ip is not permanent. i have to change it everytme i shutdown my computer and and everytime i cut off my dsl box. can someone help me as to make it to where i dont have to edit my no-ip everytime i want to rune my server?[br][size=1]Posted on: March 01, 2007, 01:08:01 PM[/size][hr]also does not having a router have something to do with this[br][size=1]Posted on: March 01, 2007, 01:08:47 PM[/size][hr]i need help plz help me out here
